properties.address: All Saints' Church,, Stisted, Braintree, Essex CM77 8AW
properties.description: Open Space provided, particularly in the South Aisle, where the space is heated, access to Wi-Fi and the making of refreshments. Toilets also available with nappy changing area in the west end of the South Aisle, where is also a toddler play area Open Space is open as follows: Friday: 10:00 a.m. to 3.00 p.m. (Open Toddler Group 9-10.30 a.m.) Saturday: 10:00 a.m. to 3.00 p.m. Sunday: 10:00 a.m.* to 3.00 p.m. *Weekly worship takes placed 10.30 for about a hour when refreshments are available afterwards.
properties.title: All Saints' Church, Stisted

properties.description: We provide a friendly face to chat to about anything. We have a variety of other activities outside of the Hotspot times, ranging from craft group, coffee morning and Mental health and Wellbeing groups. For full details and times please see our website.
properties.title: Nick Vosper

properties.address: St Mary's Church Hall. Church Street, Bocking, Essex CM7 5JY
properties.description: Each Friday from 12noon to 3pm you are invited to join us for food, company, and friendship. We meet in our lovely warm and comfortable hall with hot food from 12noon. There are refreshments throughout and cake too, of course! Everyone is welcome whether they are local or travelling from further afar. Come alone or bring a group of you, there is a place for everyone. There is no charge either, it is all free. Some choose to make a donation but this isn't necessary at all. We are running until Dec 15th, with a short break over Christmas and then back in the New Year. We hope to see you soon.
properties.title: St Mary's Church, Bocking

properties.title: Hedingham Hotspot

properties.address: 29 Bocking End, Braintree CM7 9AE, UK
properties.description: Based in Braintree, First Stop Centre is a grass roots project that offers real and immediate help to members of the community who are struggling with problems, and want to improve the quality of their lives. ​Our services encourage individuals to make positive choices; which is often a first step in re-engagement with other services and the wider community. ​Our centre serves as a location for delivering services such as: Counselling, anger management groups, English, Maths, ICT lessons and much more. These can be accessed by making contact with a member of our team.   Affordable Counselling- 1:1 appointments (assessments for interventions carried out by our qualified counselling co-ordinator) Benefits Advice- via signposting Community Fridge- Access to fresh food via our commitment as a Community Fridge CV construction Education Classes: Anger Management/Understanding your Emotions Confidence/Employability courses Digital Confidence- including: Learn my Way Using a tablet and Job Seeking Skills Basic Skills via our Sunday Learning group- making learning fun! Internet Safety (All over- seen and facilitated by our qualified Education Co-ordinator) Impartial Information, Advice and Guidance (IAG) and access to our partner organisations and other providers, via our qualified IAG specialist Safe c/o address for post A meeting venue- for other organisations All offered at First Stop Centre in Braintree- our services are for all those in the Braintree district. All our classes must be booked in advance and our counselling service as well.
properties.title: First Stop

properties.address: Church St, Braintree CM7 5JY, UK
properties.description: Every Friday until the middle of March we are offering our Church Hall as a Warm Space. There will be free tea and coffee throughout the sessions which run from 11.30am to 2pm. From 12.15pm onwards there will also be a free soup lunch. Come and be warm, come along and meet friends, old and new. We are in Bocking and hope to welcome both those in our community here, but also from further afield.
properties.title: St Mary’s Church
